TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrustNotGrantedException extends System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException

summary.span: 表示應用程式沒有執行於本機電腦的適當信任層級。

span.span: Indicates that the application does not have the appropriate level of trust to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式會提供用戶端電腦上避免從事惡意活動，例如從硬碟中刪除資料或存取網路的信任層級。By default, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications are given a level of trust on client computers that prevents them from engaging in potentially malicious activity, such as deleting data from the hard drive or accessing the network. A[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式可用權限提升或受信任的應用程式部署來要求更高的信任層級：A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can use either permission elevation or Trusted Application Deployment to request a higher level of trust: - 提高權限會要求使用者授與應用程式較高的安全性等級。Permission elevation asks the user to grant the application a higher level of security. - 受信任的應用程式部署符合的數位簽章[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式針對本機電腦上的受信任發行者清單。Trusted Application Deployment matches the digital signature of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application against a list of trusted publishers on the local machine. 會擲回： will be thrown if: - 應用程式使用提高權限，但使用者拒絕的要求更高的信任。或The application uses permission elevation and the user denies the request for elevated trust; or 應用程式使用信任的應用程式部署和數位憑證用來簽署應用程式未列示為受信任的發行者在本機電腦上。如果您已將更新部署至應用程式，而更新使用較舊版本中，使用權限和[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]會擲回，就不會安裝新版本。The application uses Trusted Application Deployment and the digital certificate used to sign the application is not listed as a trusted publisher on the local machine.If you have deployed an update to an application, and the update uses more permissions than the previous version, and [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] throws a , the new version will not install.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"這個訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo serializationInfo, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext streamingContext) cil managed

param.name: serializationInfo
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: streamingContext
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
